message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you for $15000. I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, I'm looking to spend a bit less than $15000. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
